thread.title: Senior Executive Director (West Side) - Sports and Fitness
thread.title_full: Senior Executive Director (West Side) - Sports and Fitness

title: Senior Executive Director (West Side) - Sports and Fitness
text: Posted/Updated: 10-15-2015 Brief Job Description: The Senior Executive Director would manage the overall operation of the West Side including, 310 employees, 5,200 adult member units and a budget of $21.7 million. In addition to successful operations, s/he would continue to develop and strengthen community wide relationships with donors, plus other service organizations.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
